channel.title: 07. Internet of Things (IoT) : Tech Fundamentals
channel.description: Internet of things (IoT) describes physical objects that are embedded with sensors, processing ability, software, and other technologies that connect and exchange data with other devices and systems over the internet or other communication networks.

item.title: Smart Home
item.description: A home equipped with lighting, heating, and electronic devices that can be controlled remotely by phone, computer, or mobile device.
